definitions.definition: A helpful action or an act of giving.
definitions.example: The foundation gave a much needed assist to the shelter.

definitions.definition: The act of helping another player score points or goals
definitions.example: He had two assists in the game.
This book will assist you in getting your life in order.

definitions.definition: To make a pass that leads directly towards scoring.
To help compensate for what is missing with the help of a medical technique or therapy.
To stand (at a place) or to (an opinion).
definitions.example: A great part of the nobility assisted to his opinion.

definitions.definition: To be present (at an event, occasion etc.).
